title: Lead iOS Developer
full_description: Lead iOS Developer If you are a REMOTE Senior iOS Developer with experience, please read on!Top Reasons to Work with UsLocated in beautiful SF California we are a World Class Software consulting specializing in end-to-end web and mobile app creation for the IoT sector!What You Will Be DoingJoin a small team of established Mobile developer to provide first in class software solutions to our Premeir clients.Eventually lead, mentor and develop the tech team.What You Need for this PositionFull understanding of Mobile SDLCStrong experience with iOS DevelopmentAt least one published app with a user base of greater than 100 usersHighly Proficient with:iOS DevelopmentJavascriptSwiftReactNativeReactJSAWS Service configuration and orchestrationWhat's In It for YouHighly competitive Salary and Equity Opportunities.401k w/ 5% match of 100%100% paid Medical Benefits3 weeks PTO and MORE!So, if you are a REMOTE - Senior iOS Developer with experience, please apply today! - Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
